page.title: 03TRANSPORT ON BUSHEY HEATH
page.content: Bushey Heath is served by several bus routes,operated by London Transport and London Country. There are 2 Green Line express routes to London, 708 and 719. These pass along the High Road to Stanmore and Victoria. In reverse the 719 goes to Hemel Hempstead and 708 to Aylesbury, respecting the journey of the old stage coach route.Route W9 goes to Watford via Little Bushey and Oxhey whilst 306 runs from Watford to Borehamwood. London Transport provides services 142 and 258.The 142 has run for 70 years connecting Edgeware and Watford. It now continues to Brent Cross Shopping Centre. 258 runs from Harrow to Watford. In any daytime hour it is possible to catch 10 buses from Bushey Heath to Watford. At Stanmore one connects with the Underground, at Bushey with British Rail local services.
